summary: The datastore plugin package supplies concrete storage backends for Metaflow, implementing a uniform interface to read, write, list, and manage workflow artifacts and metadata across Azure Blob Storage, Google Cloud Storage, Amazon S3, and the local filesystem.
business_intent: To abstract away the underlying storage details so Metaflow users can reliably persist and retrieve data artifacts in their preferred cloud or onâ€‘premise storage, enabling scalable, portable, and reproducible data pipelines.
